Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1 NORTH BRENTWOOD BOULEVARD,15TH FLOOR, ST. LOUIS, Missouri, 63105, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Belden Inc provides signal transmission products to distributors, end-users, installers, and original equipment manufacturers. The firm operates in two segments - Enterprise Solutions and Industrial Solutions. The Enterprise Solutions segment is a provider in network infrastructure solutions, as well as cabling and connectivity solutions for commercial audio/video and security applications. The Industrial Solutions segment is a provider of high-performance networking components and machine connectivity products.
